name: requestly
description: Requestly is a self-hosted tool to intercept, modify, and mock network requests. It includes advanced rules, debugging tools, and a browser-like UI for developers.

features.title: Request Interception
features.description: Capture and modify HTTP/HTTPS requests before they reach servers

features.title: Response Mocking
features.description: Return custom responses for testing without backend changes

features.title: Header Modification
features.description: Add, remove, or change request and response headers dynamically

features.title: Url Redirection
features.description: Redirect requests to different endpoints for testing or debugging

features.title: Query Parameter Manipulation
features.description: Modify URL parameters on the fly to test different scenarios

features.title: Request Blocking
features.description: Block specific requests to simulate failures or test error handling

features.title: Script Injection
features.description: Insert custom JavaScript into pages for testing or debugging

features.title: Session Recording
features.description: Capture network activity for later analysis and debugging
